ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is no anti-camp vode in this game. You should sit in the room not the little corridor because sitting in the corridor pulls moosh from the basement
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Doug Sorensen <belgarth_of_surefall@...>
>
> A necro friend said he just put in 48 hours to get
> those boots. Haven't heard anything about reducing the
> time. Could there be anti-camp zones like some other
> mobs perhaps?

There is no anti-camp vode in this game. You should sit in the room not the
little corridor because sitting in the corridor pulls moosh from the
basement cells.

I got my boots on my second visit, luckyly in about 4 hours, 2 boots spawned
back to back so the magician that was with me got a pair too.
